text.p: Hellas - (built 1982) 139,000 dwt del Singapore early Aug trip via W.Australia redel China $14,000 daily Great Chance.
Ideal Progress - (built 1972) 78,750 dwt 12.5 on 37 plus 2 del passing Colombo 12/18 July trip via EC India redel China $7,000 daily Noble.
Anangel Enosis - - (built 1995) 73,559 dwt 14.5 on 36.5 del Nagoya 17/20 July Nopac r/v $10,250-$10,350 daily S.Korean charterers (reported).
Bunga Saga Empat - (built 1994) 73,498 dwt 14 on 30 plus 2 del Japan 20/25 July trip Nopac r/v $10,300 daily S.Korean charterers.
Atlant II - (built 1984) 71,242 dwt 13.5 on 37.5 plus 2.7 del Gibraltar prompt trip via Maracaibo redel Rostock $9,000 daily Italmare.
Esperis P - (built 1994) 70,179 dwt 14 on 33.5 plus 0.5 del S.Brazil 5/10 Aug trip Far East $12,900 daily plus $290,000 bb Pan Ocean.
Hai Kang - (built 1995) 70,155 dwt 14.5 on 31 plus 2.5 del Japan 20/26 July trip Australian r/v $10,000 daily option four to six months trading $10,350 daily Showa.
Big Sky - (built 1994) 69,189 dwt 13.5 on 28 del Kashima 20/22 July trip Nopac r/v $10,200 daily S.Korean charterers.
Thalia - - (built 1982) 64,135 dwt 14 on 37 plus 2.2 del Far East July Nopac r/v low $9,000 daily S.Korean charterers.
Kavako (ex-Regal Trader) - (built 1975) 65,003 dwt 13 on 36 plus 3 del Ghent spot trip two laden legs Atlantic trading $8,500 daily Finagrain (reported).
Kiyoh - (built 1994) 71,862 dwt del Ube 17/23 July Newcastle r/v redel Japan $10,200 daily Daiichi (adds redel).
